Package org.fermi

Public interface to the Fermi Framework for Java to JavaScript remote method invocation (RMI).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FermiEndpoint
    A communication endpoint that is opened by the Fermi container to receive connection requests from HTTP clients.
    FermiEndpointConfigurator
    Interface must be implemented by a class whose instance can be passed to FermiContainer.newEndpoint(String, FermiEndpointConfigurator)
    FermiSession
    A representation of the connection to a remote client that persists between requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FermiContainer
    A static singleton class representing the entire Fermi container.
    FermiEndpointConfigurator.Default
    Default configuration FermiEndpoint configurator.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FermiEndpoint.State
    Possible state of a FermiEndpoint.
    FermiSession.State
    Possible state of a FermiSession.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FermiException  
    FermiRemoteException
    Represents an exception thrown by JavaScript during the execution of a remote call.

Package org.fermi Description

Public interface to the Fermi Framework for Java to JavaScript remote method invocation (RMI).
Since:
1.0
